meanings.definition: Make a photographic copy of (a document).
meanings.sent1: I will be photostatting the important papers for our records.
meanings.sent2: The office manager is photostatting the contract for safekeeping.
meanings.sent3: Photostatting the meeting agenda will ensure everyone has a copy.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like photostatting every detail of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The photostatting machine hummed as it duplicated the report.

meanings.definition: A photographic copy of a document.
meanings.sent1: He kept a photostatting of the receipt in his file.
meanings.sent2: The archive room is filled with old photostattings of historical documents.
meanings.sent3: The photostatting of the map made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The photostatting served as a backup in case the original document was lost.
meanings.sent5: The photostatting revealed the fine details of the ancient manuscript.
